featured.text: Lastly, pure olive oil is the cheapest olive oil.

Olive oil spoils quickly when exposed to direct sunlight, so it should be stored in the dark at 16-18°C.

other.text: Packaging and storage also have an impact on the quality of olive oil.

definition.zh_def: 橄欖是一種小型果實，通常呈綠色或黑色，常用於製作橄欖油或作為食物。
definition.en_def: An olive is a small fruit, typically green or black, commonly used to produce olive oil or as food.
definition.example: She added olives to the salad for extra flavor.
